From the brand

BSGlobal LED Lights

High-quality decorative lights, always give you a warm and comfortable feeling.

LED Net Lights – Easy to Use

Battery Outdoor Indoor Lights

Widely Used Strip Lights

LED Christmas Lights

Battery Operated Curtain Light

D Battery Operated – Long Service Time

660 LED Net Lights

Large Cover Size Net Lights


Solar Powered LED Christmas String Lights Outdoor Indoor Decoration

  • Christmas Wide Angle LED String Lights – Light Up Your Life

5MM led string lights surface is wide angle concave lens, with multi-angle light source, more dispersed and clear than other shapes of light, radiating a halo of light in all directions, shining but not too dazzling.

  • Extra Long Christmas String Lights

100Ft extra long outdoor wide angle string lights with 300 high quality LED, mini beads sealed against moisture, eliminate corrosion. Maximize the durability and practicality of the string lights.

  • Energy Efficient

High-quality solar panels can store a lot of electricity, and the high-bright LED light saves more energy than traditional decorative light sections, with a bulb life of up to 5,000 hours.

Auto ON/OFF Solar Lights String

  • Higher Solar Conversion
  • 6-8 hours auto charge during the day
  • Longer Working Time
  1. Auto light up for 8-12 hours when motion is detected at night
  2. Ensure that the solar panels are directly exposed to sunlight to complete the conversion of light energy into electricity.
  • Note:
  1. Please turn on the lights when charging and the light will not be on when the solar panel is absorbing solar energy.L
  2. ight sensor control, it only lights in certain dim environments or darker. But it will light as the panel covered even in daytime.

Read more

Commercial Grade 5MM Christmas Lights with Multi-function Remote Control

  • 8 Lighting Modes

Combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash, and steady on. 8 different light modes to create different styles of atmosphere and enjoy a unique light show.

  • Timer Function & Memory Function

Auto charge during the day and light up at night, 24 hours cycle. And with memory function, retain the mode before shutdown, no need to repeat the settings, saving your time and energy.

  • Durable Green Wire

Thicker and more robust than traditional lights wire. Can withstand the wear and tear of indoor or outdoor use.

  • Widely Use – Decorate Your Life

Perfect for Christmas, party, garden, Valentine’s Day, wedding, home, window, bathroom, festival, holiday, shows, restaurant, hotel, commercial building, shopping center etc.

Specification:

LED Color: Warm White
Lighting Source: Wide Angle LED
LED Quantity: 300 LED
String Lights Length： 100 FT
Lighting Mode: 8 modes
Waterproof: IP54
Output Voltage: 3V
Power Source: Solar Powered

Package Included:

  • 1 x 300 LED String Lights
  • 1 x Solar Panel
  • 1 x Remote Control

Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy – pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable “Follow the Sun” and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.
LIGHT TO LIVE, WORK, RELAX AND PLAY – Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light (2200K to 6500K) for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors
Follow the sun – bring the outdoors inside and automate your lights to gradually shift color throughout the day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being and productivity
FAST PAIRING, NO HUB NEEDED – Bluetooth + WiFi makes pairing simple and easy. Guided setup takes you step-by-step to create the perfect smart home for you
VOICE CONTROL – Works with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant devices for complete voice control
CREATE SCENES AND ROUTINES – Set scenes or put your lights on a schedule, whether at home or away

Connected Max A19 60W Smart LED Bulb

By Cree Lighting

Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy – pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable

“Follow the Sun” and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.

  • CONNECTS TO ALEXA: Be sure to enable the Cree Lighting smart skills in the Alexa app
  • QUICK START: Check out the QuickStart guide below for more information regarding bulb setup
  • SUPPORT: For additional support, check the back of your bulb box or user instructions on packaging

Read more

Read more

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use Connected Max bulbs on a 5GHz router?

No, Connected Max bulbs must be paired to a 2.4 GHz WiFi network. If you have a multi-band or mesh router, which supports both a both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands, you can must connect to the 2.4GHz band. For detailed instructions and more help, download the Connected Max Wireless Router Guide.

What does it mean if my bulb is status is “offline” or the bulb is flashing?

A power outage or router service interruption disconnected the bulb from the network. While the bulbs do not need to have constant power, if the bulb does lose any power for a long duration of time, it might need to be reset. To do that, do not remove the bulb from the app. Just select the plus sign on the main menu in the top right-hand corner of the screen. Add the bulbs with the original steps, and all names and schedules given will remain and bring your bulb back to a functional state

Can I use Connected Max bulbs with a standard wall or lamp dimmer?

No, using with a standard wall or lamp dimmer will cause interference and your bulb will not operate as intended. All Connected Max bulbs are dimmable using the Cree Lighting app or with your connected voice assistant.

Can I turn the Connected Max bulb on or off at the light switch?

No, using a wall or lamp switch to turn off the bulb is not recommended. Turning power off at the switch will make the bulb inoperable in the app or with connected voice assistant. Any schedules or automation will not run as scheduled it power is off at the switch. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at the switch.

Can I use the Connected Max bulbs with a smart switches or plug?

No, since the bulb itself has smart technology built in, there is no need to connect to any other smart switch or plug. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at smart switch or plug.

Can the Connected Max bulbs be used outdoors?

Connected Max PAR38 is designed for use outdoors. Its UL wet rating means it can get wet and exposed directly to weather or water. The rest of the Connected Max family is UL Damp Rated, which means it can be used outdoors in a fixture that is not exposed to weather or water (such as carriage light) as long as they’re protected against weather and water contact. Any bulbs used outdoors need to be within range of your WiFi router. A weak WiFi signal may cause delays or interruptions in your controllability.

4.5
Price: $28.98 - $14.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:58:32 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 10:35:57 UTC – Details)

Product Description

【Seasons Apply】This car seat cover can be suitable for every season. The outside of the material is faux leather which can be used all year round. So there is no need to buy one in summer and buy another one in winter.
【Compatibility】 It is universal fit for most of cars, SUVs and trucks. Meanwhile it has a wonderful envelopment with the car seats which can maximize the protection to the seats. We leak out the air bags, so once an accident occurs, the air bags still work.
【Clean and Durability】 This car seat cover is quite easy to clean up when your kids or pets smudge it. It is waterproof so you can use the wet towel directly on it. And when it comes to the routine care, you can treat it the same way to your leather bag. The faux leather we used is not easy to be damaged or broken by your keys, pet’s paws or some other sharp metal. And it is also not easy to be burned up as we use a kind of material which contains fire retardant inside the seat cover.
【Installation】 The installation of this seat cover is not complex. You can install it by yourself through the installation video step by step and can also read the installation instruction inside the package. Don’t forget to communicate with us by emails if you are still frustrated with the installation and we will try our best to help you.
【Post-sale service】 It has 30 days return-protection guarantee and the delivery is through the FBA. We have a problem solving team stand by and if you have any questions you can find us by emails quickly and we will try our best to help you. So just have a try and we are sure you will be satisfied with our products.

The Caséta wireless Deluxe dimmer kit with Caséta Smart Hub provides simple and personalized control of your lights, shades and temperature. Control your lights from anywhere within your home with the included Pico remote controls or from anywhere in the world using the free Lutron app. Set lights to automatically adjust with spring and fall time changes, create personalized schedules to turn on, off, or dim lights at set times to best fit your everyday routines, or control lights with your voice via Alexa and Siri. The Caséta Smart Hub also connects with other leading brands like Ring, Honeywell, Sonos, Serena shades and more. The included in-wall dimmers install easily with no neutral wire required, provide the best dimming performance for over 500 different dimmable LED bulbs, and can be controlled from anywhere within the home with the included Pico remotes. To use dimmers in a multi-location application, replace the existing switch with a Pico remote control and wall plate adapter (PICO-WBX-ADAPT, sold separately). Pico remote control takes (1) CR2032 battery, included in remote.
PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with changing seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; you can also enable the Smart Away feature to randomly turn your lights on and off to look like you’re home even if you’re away.
MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart home devices – including Alexa, Apple HomeKit, the Google Assistant, Serena shades and Sonos – than any other smart lighting control brand
CONTROL YOUR WAY: Caséta puts the smarts in the switch so you can control your lights a variety of ways – via the free Lutron app, your voice, or from the wall. You can create personalized schedules to turn on, off, or dim lights at set times to best fit your everyday routines, or activate favorite lighting scenes with the touch of a button
RELIABLY SMART: The Caséta Smart Hub doesn’t use Wi-Fi, so you get super-fast, ultra-reliable smart lighting that works right, without slowing your Wi-Fi down with more devices
SET IT AND FORGET IT: Always keep your smart light functionality. Even when the Wi-Fi goes down, there’s no need to reset your schedules and scenes or reconnect everything when it comes back online
GET MORE, SPEND LESS: One Caséta smart switch can control many bulbs at once; make many bulbs smart, even your existing bulbs get smart control of multiple styles of dimmable LED, incandescent, and halogen bulbs
WORKS WITH EXISTING WIRING: Unlike other smart dimmer switches, Caséta works in any home, of any age, as it does not require a neutral wire



Previous page

Next page

1 Wall Control 2 App Control 3 Voice Control 4 Pico Remote Control

Previous page

  1. Smart Hub

    Unlock smart features that enhance your system.

  2. Most Compatible

    Caséta works with more smart home products than any other smart lighting brand.

  3. Scheduling

    Schedule your lights to come on at dusk and have them automatically adjust as the seasons change.

  4. Geofencing

    Set your location around your home so your lights automatically turn on as you arrive home.

  5. Smart Away

    Use Smart Away to randomly turn your lights on or off to give the illusion that you are home.

Next page

1 Smart Hub 2 Most Compatible 3 Scheduling 4 Geofencing 5 Smart Away

Create Personalized Scenes and Schedules


Good Morning

Create personalized schedules for the way you live: for example, schedule kitchen lights to turn on to a soft level every morning at 6:30 (except weekends!).


Dinner with Friends

Control multiple lights at the same time by setting a scene. Save your favorites and activate them with a single touch, so you’ll always have the right light for the moment.

Product Description

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

Solid Solid Line Moroccan Leaf

Material
100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester

Package
1 panel 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels

Color Options
8 8 6 6 6

PACKAGE CONTENT & PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Our weatherproof outdoor curtains are sold in panel (1 panel in each package). Each curtain panel measures 52” width by 84” Length, a set of 2 curtain panels measures 104” width by 84” Length. The curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6”
DURABLE, BREATHABLE & PRIVACY COMFORT FABRIC: PureFit outdoor curtains are crafted from a premium, weather resistant textured fabric (100% polyester composition). Our outdoor curtains provide the perfect amount of privacy and are breathable allowing air to pass through them, creating a comfortable space
UV and FADE RESISTANT OUTDOOR CURTAINS: Our outdoor curtains block harmful UV rays from the sun and filters the amount of sunlight getting into your space creating a soft ambiance. Our fade resistant fabrics’ performance is an integral part of the fabric, not an applied finish that would wash off over time
WATERPROOF CUTAINS PERFECT FOR EVERY OUTDOOR SPACES: These waterproof panels will ensure your outdoor spaces and furniture stay free from rain or snow. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as bedroom, living room, patio, front porch, cabana, gazebo, and more. (For best wind resistance performances add weights at the bottom)
SIMPLE FABRIC CARE: Simply clean these outdoor curtains in a washing machine with cold water, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if need. Because the color goes to the core of the fiber, the fabrics will not lose their color

SOLAR POWERED & 8 MODES：Put the Christmas Lollipop stake lights outdoor and keep the switch “ON”, it will automatically charge during the day and light up at night. It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash and steady on. Note: the solar power is light control, the pathway lights will not light up with the daylight.
WATERPROOF & EASY TO INSTALL：Fcysy Lollipop Led Christmas Lights outdoor are IP44 waterproof which means it can stand with any weather condition. Easy to install, you can stake the Xmas lights to anywhere you want to decorate.
PERFECT CHRISTMAS DÉCOR OUTDOOR: Brighten your Garden with our classic solar lollipop lights. Solar Christmas lights outdoor waterproof can be used in pathway, walkway, and driveway, front yards, garden and lawn decoration. Share the warm Christmas atmosphere with your neighbors.
IDEAL CHRISTMAS GIFT: This cute and warm light up lollipop yard light is perfect gift for friends and family. It is a useful Christmas and holiday Day gift to decorate festival, can be placed anywhere outside your home to create perfect holiday atmosphere.

Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $104.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:27:49 UTC – Details)



The Echo Dot offers a built in Hub with Alexa. Ask Alexa to control Zigbee-compatible devices. No additional Philips Hue hub required.
Two choices for easy smart lighting – Start setting the mood with Hue Smart bulbs and your Echo device, supporting up to 5 Hue Bluetooth & Zigbee smart bulbs. Add the Hue Hub for whole-home smart lighting (up to 50 light points) and bonus features.
Hands-free voice control – Wind down before bed without touching your phone. Just say, “Alexa, dim the lights”. Cooking with two-hands full? Just ask Alexa to make your lights brighter, to better see your recipe. Say, “Alexa, I’m leaving” and she can turn your Philips Hue smart lights on/off to make it look like someone is home.
Control your lights with Alexa – Connect your Philips Hue smart lights to Alexa for easy voice control. Just ask, “Alexa, turn on the living room light”.
Existing Philips Hue customers – This smart light, while Bluetooth compatible, will continue to work with your Hue Hub and can be seamlessly integrated into your Hue Ecosystem. Continue to light your home smarter with Philips Hue.

Smartphone Control: Connect smart lamp with Go_sund_App to manage smart home conveniently. Feel free to power on/off, dim brightness, change colors or scenes of the table lamp with easy control via App. Only support 2.4GHz WiFi, no hub required
Hands-Free Voice Control: The bedside lamp works with Alexa and Google Home to free up your hands; You can switch on/off and even change the colors of your lamp by simple voice command. No worries about can’t find the light switch when you walk into a dark room.
Tap Top to Power on/off: The creative built-in touch sensor allows you to tap twice on the top of the lamp to turn it on or off. Manually work with the slide area to change brightness and colors. It is convenient to switch white and color modes with the front button directly
16 Million Colors and 8 Scenes: With 16 million colors, you can select any color in the spectrum via your phone App to create an atmosphere such as a romantic dinner or warm sleep. Scenes are able to be created for your desired ambiance, like multiple colors, 1% – 100% brightness, and color-changing speed.
Timer & Schedule: The smart lamp can be turned on or off automatically according to the time you set. Or set a schedule to turn off the lamp based on your family’s sleep schedule.
